import { Button } from '../../components/common/button' import { Input } from '../../components/common/input' import { Range } from '../../components/common/range' import styles from './styles.module.scss' import axios from 'axios'; import { ISignup } from '../../global/interfaces'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Form } from '@unform/web' import { cpfExpression, userPasswordExpression } from '../../global/regularExpressions'; const Signup: React.FC = () => { async function registerUser(userdata: ISignup) { const isValidData = userdata.user !== '' && userdata.email !== '' && userdata.cpf !== '' && cpfExpression.test(userdata.cpf) && userdata.password !== '' && userPasswordExpression.test(userdata.password) isValidData && await axios({ method: 'post', url: 'http://localhost:5000/users', data: { nome: userdata.user, email: userdata.email, cpf: userdata.cpf, senha: userdata.password } }) } const initialData = { name: '', email: '', cpf: '', password: '' } return ( <>
M
Fazer login
) } export default Signup
